title: Movement of Ecologists – Citizens' Cooperation
text:
The Movement of Ecologists – Citizens' Cooperation (KOSP) (), formerly known as the Ecological and Environmental Movement (), is a <a href="Green%20politics">green</a> <a href="List%20of%20political%20parties%20in%20Cyprus">political party in Cyprus</a>.
In both the <a href="2001%20Cypriot%20legislative%20election">2001</a> and <a href="2006%20Cypriot%20legislative%20election">2006</a> legislative elections, the party won 2.0% of the popular vote and 1 of 56 seats. In <a href="2011%20Cypriot%20legislative%20election">2011</a>, it garnered 2.2% of the popular vote, and its sole parliamentarian, <a href="George%20Perdikes">George Perdikes</a>, retained his seat.
The party increased its seat count from 1 to 2 following the <a href="2016%20Cypriot%20legislative%20election">2016 legislative elections</a>, where it obtained 4.8% of the vote, coming in seventh place. In the same year, the party adopted its current name and a new logo.
